Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: 'Hello? Are you still there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: "C'mon, I really need you to pull yourself together...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: "I wonder what's going to happen down the road. Oh, silly me. Why don't I just ask you to spill some beans for me!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: "You can find game strategies everywhere in your world, right? I mean, you've got forums, sites, and magazines on game strategies... Well, I guess magazines might be a bit old-fashioned these days. So? What do you say?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: "That's right. It's not cheating. You're just trying to be careful here... I mean, given that your world hinges on the game, you can't really afford to make a mistake, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: 'Wait, you refuse to "cheat"? Pretty hardcore, I guess... But I totally feel you. What\'s a game if you don\'t get to enjoy it your own way, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: 'Anyway, this is going to be our last fightâ€”so hit the washroom now if you need to, warm your fingers up, and tell your mama to leave you alone for a while.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl On Her Own', 3: "Ready? Alright, let's do this!", 4: '1'}
